name: Magus Room (WIP)
description:
Magus Room was made in UE4 and using several 3D software tools as a learning experience and portfolio piece. I made all the assets present in this demo except for the pictures in frames and some art on a few book covers.  It is not finished.

At some point in development I tried to turn it into a escape room-like puzzle game, but  found out I'm terrible at puzzle design and wasn't really enjoying it so I dropped it. Instead, what you will find is a relaxing first person experience about exploring a wizard's messy room with little interaction.

It's not really optimised, you need an above-average PC to move this project, runs at 40fps using:
Radeon RX 480
i5 4690
24GB RAM

Check my twitter and tumblr if you want to see what else I'm up to.
